Package oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.globalSearch.ui.managed

This package is for Global Search managed bean classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BaseSingleSelectLOVBean A base implementation of a Single Select Bean to do the heavy lifting for Single Select LOVs used in Global Search.
GlobalSearchBaseBean Backing bean for global search.
GlobalSearchCategoryLOVBean The List of values bean for Categories used in Global Search filters.
GlobalSearchFacetItemLOVBean  
GlobalSearchFacetLOVBean The List of values bean for Facets used in Global Search filters.
GlobalSearchField Backing bean for the global search Field taskflow.
GlobalSearchFilterBarBean Backing bean for the filter bar in the global search results popup.
GlobalSearchLastUpdateDateLOVBean The List of values bean for Single Select Last Update Date ranges used in Global Search filters.
GlobalSearchPersonalizeBean Backing bean for global search Personalize popup (GlobalSearchPersonalizeDC.jsff).
GlobalSearchResultTabBean Backing bean for the result panel in the global search results popup.
GlobalSearchResultTabPersonalizeBean Backing bean for global search Personalize popup (GlobalSearchResultTabPersonalize.jsff).
GlobalSearchSearchableObjectLOVBean The List of values bean for Searchable Objects used in Global Search filters.
GlobalSearchSessionBean A Java bean stored in the JSF session for the current user using Global Search.
GlobalSearchSortOptionsBean The backing bean for Sort Options for sorting a result.
GlobalSearchTabletSummaryBean Backing bean for GlobalSearchTabletSummaryDC.
GlobalSearchTagCloudLOVBean The List of values bean for the Tag Cloud used in Global Search filters.
SearchConfiguration A pageFlowScope managed bean for handling the Global Search Setup Flows.
SearchGroupSelection  
SessionDiscriminator A simple class that allows detection of a change in environment that indicates Global Search must reload it's cache of information.
 

Package oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.globalSearch.ui.managed Description

This package is for Global Search managed bean classes.
